title: can't rebuild with NO_CUDA=1 after clean
body_html:
I used to be able to do:

  python setup.py build_deps develop
  python setup.py clean
  NO_CUDA=1 python setup.py build_deps develop

this now fails in THD with:

In file included from /home/gchanan/local/pytorch9i2/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/DataChannelGloo.cpp:3:0:
/home/gchanan/local/pytorch9i2/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/GlooCache.hpp: In static member function ‘static thd::GlooCache::key_type thd::gloo_cache::algorithm_spec<(thd::CollectiveType)3u, T>::key(THDGroup, thd::DeviceType, std::size_t, std::size_t, THDReduceOp)’:
/home/gchanan/local/pytorch9i2/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/GlooCache.hpp:300:68: error: there are no arguments to ‘THDGetCudaState’ that depend on a template parameter, so a declaration of ‘THDGetCudaState’ must be available [-fpermissive]
auto cuda_stream = THCState_getCurrentStream(THDGetCudaState());

among other errors.

CC @teng-li @ailzhang
